knowledge.finishTip: All files uploaded will be added to the training queue. Please check the training progress on the left side

form.name: Name
form.embedModelTip: The embedding model transforms complex vocabulary or data into simple numerical vectors, making it easier for computers to understand the meaning of language and improving the performance of machine learning models.

knowledge.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this knowledge?
knowledge.fileSubTitle: Upload local files (such as PDF, DOCX, TXT) as a knowledge source.
knowledge.linkSubTitle: Use web links as a knowledgwe source.
knowledge.cusTextSubTitle: Enter custom text as a knowledge source.
knowledge.returnQuanityTip: Please input Candidate Quantity must be greater than Return Quantity
knowledge.embeddingModelTip: After switching the embedding model, it is necessary to retrain the knowledge base documents. Please check the training status in the knowledge base details.
knowledge.textSearchDesc: Based on keyword search technology, it searches and extracts relevant documents from large volumes of text data.
knowledge.vectorSearchDesc: Utilizing vector space models, it finds the best-matching data by calculating the similarity between vectors in high-dimensional space.
knowledge.rerankModelDesc: After the initial generation of search results, specific algorithms are used to reorder the results to enhance their relevance.
knowledge.chunkCountTip: The number of chunks returned by the retrieval, indicating the upper limit on the number of chunks returned after each search.

documents.title: Documents
documents.description: Document management is used for adding new knowledge, including local file, web links, or custom text. The newly added knowledge can be segmented to facilitate its use by bots.
documents.name: NAME
documents.deepTip: When retrieving website content, depth determines the hierarchical level of links to be crawled, specifying how many levels of links can be followed from the starting page.
documents.webLinkSaveFailed: Please correct the errors in the form or failed to save web link data
documents.selectSemanticModel: Please select a semantic model when Semantic Chunk Parsing is enabled.
documents.selectOcrModel: Please select an OCR model when OCR Enhancement is enabled.
documents.fullTextMethod: Extract all text content directly, enabling OCR for scanned PDFs.
documents.fullTextDescription: Preserves original text format and paragraph structure, ensuring complete content coverage (OCR for PDFs, direct extraction for MD/TXT).
documents.chapterMethod: Extract based on heading levels (e.g., H1/H2/H3) or chapter delimiters.
documents.chapterDescription: Uses document structure (e.g., headings, section breaks) to extract content, maintaining chapter logic, suitable for technical documents, theses, etc.
documents.pageMethod: Split by slide pages, treating each page as an independent unit.
documents.pageDescription: Preserves the independence of each slide's content and visuals, suitable for presentations with page logic.
documents.worksheetMethod: Extract each worksheet (Sheet) as an independent unit.
documents.worksheetDescription: Preserves table structure and data (e.g., formulas, merged cells), suitable for scenarios requiring complete table information.
documents.rowMethod: Extract headers and row data, converting to structured data format.
documents.rowDescription: Generates header fields and row records, suitable for data cleaning, analysis, or machine learning needs.
documents.ocrEnhancementDesc: OCR (Optical Character Recognition) technology is used to recognize and convert characters in images into editable text, improving the accuracy and effectiveness of text recognition.
documents.fixedChunkDesc: Split the document into fixed-size chunks.
documents.overlapChunkDesc: Split the document into chunks with overlapping content.
documents.semanticChunkDesc: Split the document based on semantic meaning.
documents.noChunkDesc: Do not split the document into chunks.
documents.fixedFormats: Text files (TXT), PPT, PDF, Excel, etc.
documents.fixedMethod: Split content by a preset fixed length, such as 256 characters per chunk.
documents.fixedDescription: Clear rules and efficient processing, suitable for quick batch data processing. However, it may cause semantic breaks due to mechanical splitting (e.g., truncating sentences or tables), requiring a balance between efficiency and content integrity.
documents.overlapMethod: Based on fixed-length chunking, set overlapping content between chunks (e.g., 30 characters repeated) to retain contextual associations through a sliding window.
documents.overlapDescription: Reduces semantic breaks through overlap, suitable for tasks requiring continuous context (e.g., text analysis), but may lead to storage redundancy due to repeated content.
documents.semanticFormats: Structured documents (Word, Markdown), technical documents (PDF with table of contents).
documents.semanticMethod: Split based on content logic, using algorithms to understand semantics and identify different paragraphs or topics.
documents.semanticDescription: Retains complete semantic units (e.g., chapters, paragraphs, function modules), suitable for long text processing requiring logical associations, but highly dependent on document structure or algorithms.
documents.noneFormats: Short texts (emails, summaries), small files (single-page PPT, simple tables, short TXT).
documents.noneMethod: Process the entire text without any splitting.
documents.noneDescription: Retains the global association of the entire document, suitable for scenarios requiring overall understanding (e.g., summary generation, full-text retrieval). However, it requires high computational resources and has low efficiency in processing long texts.

testing.title: Testing
testing.description: Test the knowledge base recall effectiveness based on the given query text.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Here you can modify the properties and working methods of the Knowledge.

form.name: Name
form.temperatureTip: Used to control the randomness and creativity of text generation; a low temperature produces more definitive results, while a high temperature increases the diversity and randomness of the text.
form.promptTip: You can input relevant prompts to guide the model in generating specific responses by providing context or questions to adjust the direction and quality of the output content.

skill.chatHistoryTip: The chat history count refers to the total number of interaction turns or messages between the user and the robot. This count can help the robot understand the context and enhance the relevance and coherence of its responses.
skill.ragTip: RAG is an architecture that combines information retrieval with generation models, first retrieving relevant information from a knowledge base and then using the generation model to produce contextually relevant responses.
skill.knowledgeBaseTip: The knowledge base is used as a source of knowledge for the skill. The threshold usually indicates the relevance requirement of the matching answer in the knowledge base, with a higher value indicating that the matching result needs to be more relevant to the user question. Only highly relevant answers will be selected as sources.
skill.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this skill?
skill.toolTip: The tool is used to provide the skill with the ability to obtain external data or perform operations. The specific tool to be called is determined autonomously by the large model.

settings.title: LLM Skill
settings.description: LLM skills include the selection of LLM models and knowledge bases to optimize language understanding and generation processes. Users can also enable RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) and conversation enhancement features to improve dialogue quality and accuracy.
settings.noKnowledgeBase: No knowledge base has been set up yet.

rules.name: Name
rules.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this rule?

tool.name: Name
tool.label: Label
tool.title: Tool
tool.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this tool?

provider.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this model?

studio.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this studio?
studio.offDeleteConfirm: Please go offline before deleting the bot.

form.name: Name
form.modelTip: Please select the Rasa small model to be used by this application for filtering and closing simple questions, reducing API calls and token consumption of the large model.
form.replicaCountTip: The number of Pilot instances running the AI application. Increasing the number of instances enhances the fault tolerance and availability of the application. The default is 1.

settings.title: Settings
settings.noChannelHasBeenOpened: No channel has been opened yet.
settings.noSkillHasBeenSelected: No skill has been selected yet.
settings.description: Select the corresponding skills for the bot, configure the relevant information, and then publish.
settings.publishTip: After the robot is published, it will be updated on the selected channels.
settings.selectedParams: Please ensure that the selected channels parameters are configured.

channel.title: Channel
channel.description: Built-in with multiple messaging channels, allowing the bot to interact with users through these channels.

logs.title: Conversation Logs
logs.description: You can view the log records of the conversation between the user and the robot, and restore the conversation scene.
logs.searchUser: Please enter the user name to search...

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.description: The operational statistics of the Bot are used to analyze the usage and invocation of the robot by users.
statistics.totalConsumptionDesc: This reports the total amount of Token consumed within the selected time range.
statistics.totalConsumptionOverviewDesc: This provides statistics on the time distribution of Token consumption within the selected time range.
statistics.totalConversationDesc: This counts the total number of conversations by all users of the Bot within the selected time range. Each question and answer counts as one conversation round, and Bot testing questions and answers are not included in the statistics.
statistics.totalActiveUserDesc: This counts the number of distinct users who engaged in conversations with the Bot within the selected time range.

chat.clearConfirm: You are about to clear the conversation. After clearing, you will not be able to retrieve it. Do you want to clear the current conversation?
chat.question: Question
chat.removeAnnotationConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this annotation?

manageQuota.title: Manage Quota
manageQuota.content: The administrator can set different quotas for different roles.
manageQuota.name: NAME

form.name: Name
form.sharedTooltip: Quota shared among individuals in the organization.
form.uniformTooltip: Quota uniformly applied to each individual in the organization.

myQuota.title: My Quota
myQuota.content: Show my total quota usage. Please contact the administrator to apply for an increase when the quota is insufficient.

secret.title: API Secret Keys
secret.content: To prevent API abuse, protect your API Key.
secret.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this secret key?
